content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;


SELECT * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type


-- Pull Out Columns

SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type




-- CHECK DTYPES


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, ''$.payment_type'') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, ''$.payment_type_desc'') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''payment_type.json'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''1.0'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ''0x0b'',
        FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b'',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''0x0a''
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type'



-- JSON_VALUE is not efficient Function
-- WE Will mostly use OPENJSON function


SELECT 
    *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type
-- Parse the Result to OPENJSON
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc);


-- Select the Columns



SELECT 
    payment_type,
    payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
--Specify the Columns
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
);



--change column name



SELECT 
    payment_type,
    description
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
--Specify the Columns
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
);


-- READING DATA FROM JSON FILE WHICH HAVE ARRAYS.

SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    --payment_type_desc is an array
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_0,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_1
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type



-- Above is not good option
-- Array can have many values


SELECT 
    *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
)



-- Let's select the columns



SELECT 
    *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    -- payment_type_desc is an Json file in itself, we will further use Cross APPLY
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
)
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
WITH (
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    value VARCHAR(20)
)



-- Now, lets select the columns



SELECT 
    payment_type,
    payment_type_desc_value, 
    sub_type
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'  -- NEWLINE CHARACTER
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS Payment_Type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    -- payment_type_desc is an Json file in itself, we will further use Cross APPLY
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
)
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
WITH (
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(20) '$.value'
)
